summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5790 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 37, D. S. Maynard's Plat and Block 203, Seattle Tide Lands, being the alley between 5th Avenue South and 6th Avenue South from Lane Street to Dearborn Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76350, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
